#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
long long gcd(long long a,long long b)
{
  if(b==0)
  return a;
  else
   return gcd(b,a%b);
 }
 long long unique(long long a,long long b)
 {
    if(b==1)
   return 0;
   long long d=gcd(a,b);
  
   if(d==1)
   return 1;
   return unique(a,b/d);
   
 }
 int main()
 {
  long long t,a,b,ans;
  cin>>t;
  while(t--)
  { 
    cin>>a>>b;
    ans=unique(a,b);
    if(ans)
    cout<<"No\n";
    else
    cout<<"Yes\n";
   }
   return 0;
   }
